channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2165] Tik Tok and California Gurls are the same song?
item.description: Tik Tok and California Gurls, both written and produced by the same guy, both #1 hits, are actually the same song...

item.title: [+2047] Bill O’Reilly Humiliates Sarah Palin On Fox News
item.description: Sarah Palin made another rash appearance on Bill O’Reilly’s "The Factor" Friday night, wherein he grilled her about immigration reform. The half-term governor left the Fox News Channel program angry and humilitated as O’Reilly exposed Palin’s limited knowledge for the Fox News crowd to see. You have to watch the video for yourself.

item.title: [+1659] I hope this actually works (PIC)
[+1553] 6 Completely Legal Ways The Cops Can Screw You
item.description: We are so lucky to be living in an era of law where suspect interrogations with live cobras tied to the ends of nightsticks are no longer common. Unfortunately, there are still many colorful ways the police can royally screw you while Lady Justice shrugs.

item.title: [+1509] 6 Reasons to Ride a Polar Bear to Work - The Oatmeal
[+1219] Oh my gosh......you shouldn't have......
[+1105] The Dangerous Fight Against Military Christian Supremacists
item.description: Mikey Weinstein, the 55-year-old founder of the Albuquerque, New Mexico-based Military Religious Freedom Foundation (MRFF), has recorded a tremendous string of victories in the fight against Christian supremacists inside the armed forces.

item.title: [+958] We're in a Recession Because the Rich Are Raking it in
item.description: Our economy can't thrive when the richest 1% get an ever larger share of the nation's income and wealth, and everyone else's share shrinks. The problem isn't that typical Americans have spent beyond their means. It's that their means haven't kept up with what the growing economy could and should have been able to provide them.

item.title: [+889] Not the best choice to hire as a ref
[+875] Acting Lesson - Better than lessons from a theatre school
[+769] Google App Inventor: Now Anyone Can Create an Android App
item.description: Google is launching a new tool on Monday that lets anyone create an app for Android phones. Google App Inventor claims to enable non-coders to develop complete, working Android apps by connecting a series of “blocks”. Google has been testing App Inventor in schools for a year, reports the NYTimes.

item.title: [+655] xkcd: Dilution
[+641] Cultural Sensitivity (pic)
[+619] A Guide to Disney’s Horrible Female Role Models
item.description: Over the past fifteen years, Disney has cycled through three waves of female stars. In doing so, they’ve created a perpetual whoredom machine that benefits no one but virile males. (With Photographic Evidence.)

item.title: [+572] 5 Reasons Predators Is The Sequel Predator Deserved
item.description: John McTiernan’s film Predator is an 80s classic. It’s biggest problem, however, is that it was too successful for its own good and, in the last 23 years, has spawned three other films featuring the Predator that have never been worthy of the original. This weekend the 5th movie in the franchise finally did right by it. Here's how.

item.title: [+560] Google Maps has no data overlay whatsoever for North Korea
[+559] $355 A Week Is Tough, But It's Even Harder Without It...
item.description: Debra Rousey doesn't want to get an unemployment check every week. She'd much rather get a paycheck, as she used to back in November, before she lost her job as an assistant bank manager. But now that her unemployment benefits have ended, and Congress is deadlocked about extending them, she needs the money just to keep the lights on and a roof over

item.title: [+552] 8 Brilliant Artists from Deviant Art!
item.description: I consider DeviantArt the hub of extraordinary artists and brilliantly creative minds from around the world.

item.title: [+535] Boxing Kangaroo Owns Woman
item.description: The kangaroo has got some great moves, but he's still a little green. He doesn't know you wait until you need to spice things up a bit before you go for the rear mount on a woman.

item.title: [+529] Conservatives vs The Constitution, Make Up Your Minds
item.description: For the better part of the last couple of decades, conservatives took a fairly aggressive approach to constitutional amendments: they wanted several more. Indeed, by the mid-point of his presidency, George W. Bush was on record supporting at least six different proposed amendments to the Constitution: (1) prohibiting flag burning; (2) victims’ ri..
